instruments.name: Snare Drum
instruments.placement: Off-axis, 3 inches from the rim pointing to the center

instruments.name: Kick Drum
instruments.placement: Pointing directly to the sound hole, experiment with proximity and depth

instruments.name: Acoustic Guitar
instruments.placement: Off-axis to the sound hole, pointing towards it by the middle of the arm

instruments.name: Violin
instruments.placement: 3 to 6 feet above the Violin, point to the center of the instrument from the front

instruments.name: Piano
instruments.placement: Stereo pair, pointing to the action, treble closer than the bass

instruments.name: Vocals
instruments.placement: Slightly above the singer, 1.5 to 3 feet away
